results.name: Asda Stores Ltd
results.provider: North Yorkshire And Humber Area Team
results.summary:
Asda pharmacies provide a variety of healthcare services to help you make the most of your health and wellbeing.


We're here when you need us; we're open 7 days a week, including late evenings and bank holidays.


Appointments aren’t necessary, so you can visit an Asda pharmacy when its convenient for you.


Our trained pharmacists are happy to help and can discuss the services we have to offer. 


All Asda pharmacies have a private room available where you can talk to the pharmacist confidentially, please ask a member of our pharmacy team for more information.

results.name: LloydsPharmacy Inside Sainsbury's
results.provider: North Yorkshire And Humber Area Team

results.name: Parkers Pharmacy
results.provider: North Yorkshire And Humber Area Team
results.summary:
Established for many year, we pride ourselves on a high standard personal service and catering for the needs of our local community.

Our reputation has been built on our commitment to personal service and attention to detail, which is reflected in the services we offer and the time we take to get to know everyone who comes through our door.

Our dispensing service includes both our while-you-wait and collection and delivery options, where we pick the prescription up from your GP surgery and can deliver it direct to your door, free of charge.

Choosing a pharmacy is one of the most important decisions you can make. You want someone who is caring, knowledgeable, and accessible. Someone willing to take the time to go over all of your options and treat you as a person, not just a patient. 

At our pharmacy, we pride ourselves on our patient service. We offer knowledgeable staff, safe and proven procedures, and the latest in pharmacy technology.

We've created this web site for both new and current customers. It includes specific information on our pharmacy and the wide range of services we offer.

Other services available include Lipotrim Weight Loss Programme, Stop Smoking Clinic and Blood Pressure Monitoring - see our Services page for full details.

We have our own private consultation room and also offer advice on your medicines free of charge.

We look forward to meeting you soon and looking after you in the years to come.
                                                                  

Best Regards ....  


Esther
Pharmacist

results.outOfHours: Open til 11pm during the week and til 7pm on Saturday and 5pm on Sunday
results.name: Huntington Pharmacy
results.provider: North Yorkshire And Humber Area Team
results.summary: Huntington Pharmacy is a patient-focused, late-night opening pharmacy located at the Huntington Surgery. We are a dedicated and committed team, lead by our experienced pharmacists Richard, Sonisya, Wye Bing and Katie. We aim to provide a friendly and efficient service to the local community, ensuring we go the extra mile to meet all your healthcare needs.
